scripts.db-init: cd $(npm bin)/../..; echo 'Deleting db & logs'; rm -rf db; rm -rf log; mkdir db; mkdir log; echo 'Initializing db'; initdb $(npm bin)/../../db; pg_ctl -D $(npm bin)/../../db -l $(npm bin)/../../log/postgres.log start; sleep 4; psql -f config/create_tube.sql -d postgres; psql -f db_setup/db.sql -d tube; pg_ctl -D $(npm bin)/../../db stop -s -m fast;
scripts.db-reset: npm run db-stop; npm run db-init; npm run db-start;
